statements: INSERT INTO iot_devices (device_id, device_name, device_location, device_status) VALUES (1, 'Device 1', 'Location A', true) ON CONFLICT (device_id) DO UPDATE SET device_name = 'Device 1', device_location = 'Location A', device_status = true;

INSERT INTO iot_devices (device_id, device_name, device_location, device_status) VALUES (2, 'Device 2', 'Location B', false) ON CONFLICT (device_id) DO UPDATE SET device_name = 'Device 2', device_location = 'Location B', device_status = false;

INSERT INTO iot_devices (device_id, device_name, device_location, device_status) VALUES (3, 'Device 3', 'Location C', true) ON CONFLICT (device_id) DO UPDATE SET device_name = 'Device 3', device_location = 'Location C', device_status = true;
UPSERT INTO devices (device_id, device_name, device_location) VALUES (1, 'Device 1', 'Location 1') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE device_name = 'Device 1', device_location = 'Location 1';
UPSERT INTO devices (device_id, device_name, device_location) VALUES (2, 'Device 2', 'Location 2') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE device_name = 'Device 2', device_location = 'Location 2';

UPSERT INTO data (data_id, device_id, data_value, data_timestamp) VALUES (1, 1, 'Value 1', '2022-01-01 12:00:00') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE data_value = 'Value 1', data_timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
UPSERT INTO devices (id, name, location, status) VALUES (1, 'Device 1', 'Location 1', 1)
UPSERT INTO devices (id, name, location, status) VALUES (2, 'Device 2', 'Location 2', 0)
UPSERT INTO devices (id, name, location, status) VALUES (3, 'Device 3', 'Location 3', 1)
INSERT INTO Devices (device_id, device_name, device_type) VALUES (1, 'Phone', 'Mobile') ON CONFLICT (device_id) DO UPDATE SET device_name = 'Phone', device_type = 'Mobile';

INSERT INTO Sensors (sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type, device_id) VALUES (1, 'Temperature Sensor', 'Temperature', 1) ON CONFLICT (sensor_id) DO UPDATE SET sensor_name = 'Temperature Sensor', sensor_type = 'Temperature', device_id = 1;

INSERT INTO Readings (reading_id, reading_value, reading_timestamp, sensor_id) VALUES (1, 25.5, '2021-09-27 12:00:00', 1) ON CONFLICT (reading_id) DO UPDATE SET reading_value = 25.5, reading_timestamp = '2021-09-27 12:00:00', sensor_id = 1;
